AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented aliens: individuals suspected of crossing the border illegally, found in a pickup truck camper during a stop on Interstate Highway 35
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.pickup truck camper: vehicle stopped by United States Border Patrol on Interstate Highway 35, containing undocumented aliens and searched based on probable cause
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States-Mexican border: border approximately 100 miles south of where the pickup truck camper was stopped
